answers.answer: Arrggg.  What a pain.  Sorry, I know this all can be very confusing.  Just what you want after major surgery . . .  a period!  I'm going to guess it is coincidence.  I would talk to your doctor about your irregularity though.  Obviously diabetes and hormones can go hand in hand---  have you had your thyroid checked?  I would work on the aspect of finding out why exactly you are so irregular but this doesn't sound related to the surgery.  Although it is reverse than what you normally see which is an even LONGER cycle (no period) after a body trauma like surgery.  If you feel concerned, bleeding increases, etc. please call your doctor.  Good luck recuperating from your surgery!
